trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render an option button control (also known as a radio button) with or without visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 提供用來呈現包含或不包含視覺化樣式的選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (亦稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button)) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer> class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render an option button control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer>類別提供一組`static`方法可以用來呈現選項按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: To draw an option button, use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要繪製的選項按鈕，使用其中一種<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會提供各種不同的選項，例如繪製文字或選項按鈕的影像。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A> will draw the option button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A>時，會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A> will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A>時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該會自動比對目前的作業系統的視覺化樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.RadioButton?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會包裝的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>設定為其中一個項目所公開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.RadioButton?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A> method to draw an option button that responds to mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫使用的自訂控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A>方法來繪製滑鼠點選回應的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the background of the parent of <c>childControl</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用於繪製 <c>childControl</c> 之父代背景的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to draw the parent control's background.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，會在其中繪製父控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle should be inside the child control’s bounds.
trans-unit.target: 這個矩形應該位於子控制項的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: The control whose parent's background will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 要繪製其父代背景的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of a control's parent in the specified area.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的區域中繪製控制項父代的背景。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button (also known as a radio button) with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕）。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button).
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the option button.
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the option button glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 要在上面繪製選項按鈕圖像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button) in the specified state and location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的狀態下和位置中繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the option button.
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the option button glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 要在上面繪製選項按鈕圖像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>radioButtonText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 隨選項按鈕一起繪製的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>radioButtonText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示繪製焦點矩形，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button) in the specified state and location, with the specified text, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字以及選擇性的焦點矩形，在指定的狀態下和位置中繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState%29> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw an option button in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Point%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState%29>中自訂控制項的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法，取決於滑鼠指標位置的狀態繪製選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the option button.
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the option button glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 要在上面繪製選項按鈕圖像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>radioButtonText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 隨選項按鈕一起繪製的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>radioButtonText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示繪製焦點矩形，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button) in the specified state and location, with the specified text and text formatting, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字和文字格式，以及選擇性的焦點矩形，在指定的狀態下和位置中繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the option button.
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the option button glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 要在上面繪製選項按鈕圖像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>radioButtonText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 隨選項按鈕一起繪製的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>radioButtonText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 隨選項按鈕一起繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>image</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製 <c>image</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示繪製焦點矩形，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button) in the specified state and location, with the specified text and image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字和影像，以及選擇性的焦點矩形，在指定的狀態下和位置中繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the option button.
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to draw the option button glyph at.
trans-unit.target: 要在上面繪製選項按鈕圖像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>radioButtonText</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 隨選項按鈕一起繪製的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>radioButtonText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至 <c>radioButtonText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw with the option button.
trans-unit.target: 隨選項按鈕一起繪製的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> to draw <c>image</c> in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中繪製 <c>image</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示繪製焦點矩形，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Draws an option button control (also known as a radio button) in the specified state and location; with the specified text, text formatting, and image; and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文字、文字格式和影像，以及選擇性的焦點矩形，在指定的狀態下和位置中繪製選項按鈕 (Option button) 控制項 (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button))。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the option button with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的選項按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will draw the option button with the classic Windows style.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法時，會繪製選項按鈕，使用傳統的視窗樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the option button.
trans-unit.target: 繪製選項按鈕所用的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size, in pixels, of the option button (also known as a radio button) glyph.
trans-unit.target: 傳回選項按鈕 (Option button) (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button)) 圖像的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size, in pixels, of the option button glyph.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示選項按鈕圖像的大小 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個值取決於目前作業系統的視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.GetGlyphSize%2A> method to determine the bounds of the option button text.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.GetGlyphSize%2A>方法，以判斷選項按鈕文字的界限。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the option button.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState" /> 值，指定選項按鈕的可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the background of the option button (also known as a radio button) has semitransparent or alpha-blended pieces.
trans-unit.target: 指出選項按鈕 (Option button) (也稱為選項按鈕 (Radio button)) 的背景是否有半透明或 Alpha 混合的片段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the background of the option button has semitransparent or alpha-blended pieces; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項按鈕的背景有半透明或 Alpha 混合的片段，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出產生器是否會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer> uses the setting from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A>屬性是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer>使用中的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷轉譯樣式。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A> is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A>是`false`，轉譯器永遠會轉譯使用視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A> property to show the render style is changed depending on the application state.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.RenderMatchingApplicationState%2A>屬性，以顯示轉譯樣式會隨著應用程式的狀態而改變。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer>類別。
